ul.li: Della architettura di Leon Battista Alberti libri 10, della pittura libri 3 e della statua libro 1 / The architecture of Leon Battista Alberti in ten books, of painting in three books and of statuary in one book (uebers. von Cosimo Bartoli und Giacomo Le

The architecture of Leon Battista Alberti [microform] : in ten books of painting, in three books and of statuary in one book / translated into Italian by Cosimo Bartoli and now first into English and divided into three volumes by James Leoni.
